(venv) C:\code\rsidstools>doskey /history
py -m venv venv
venv\Scripts\activate
py -m pip install --upgrade pip
py -m pip install --upgrade build
py -m build
py -m pip install --upgrade twine
py -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
py -m build
py -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*
py -m build
py -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
pip install setuptools wheel
python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel
py -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*
py -m build
py -m twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*
doskey /history



(venv) C:\code\test-pip>doskey /history
c:/code/test-pip/venv/Scripts/activate.bat
pip install rsidatasciencetools
python test.py
pip uninstall rsidatasciencetools
pip install rsidatasciencetools==0.0.3
python test.py
pip install rsidatasciencetools
pip uninstall rsidatasciencetools
pip install rsidatasciencetools
pip uninstall rsidatasciencetools
pip install rsidatasciencetools==0.0.4
python test.py
doskey /history
